title: Cardano for African impact ventures
description: Lack of in-depth knowledge of exact needs of impact entrepreneurs in Africa, and awareness of how blockchain solutions can be of help

f6_assessments.q0: The  core aim of the 'Grow Africa' initiative is to increase Cardano awareness and understanding on the African continent. The purpose of this proposal is to produce intro workshops and build tangible use-cases to enhance Cardano adoption in Africa by providing an unequaled chance to raise awareness of Cardano in Africa through the worldwide Impact Hub Network and its flagship initiative, Accelerate2030. This will aid in the development and acceptance of the Cardano blockchain throughout Africa, helping to achieve the aim of making Cardano the block chain of choice in Africa by 2023. This proposal presents a Cardano technology use-case solution in detail. This proposal adequately addresses the challenge.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is an amazing effort that aims to boost Cardano awareness in Africa through the well-established global impact hub Accelerate2030. It aims to have an impact on African entrepreneurs, share information about blockchain technology, and help increase Cardano adoption in Africa. The proposal has the potential to make a huge impact on the Catalyst community and the Cardano ecosystem by stimulating development in Africa. As a result, it converses with the challenge's goal. Many Africans, particularly entrepreneurs, are unaware of Cardano and blockchain technology, and to be honest, this project will have an impact on entrepreneurs in Africa and beyond across the innovation ecosystems.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal team's qualifications have been provided, and their organization/program website indicates that they have extensive experience connecting entrepreneurs and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). The team appears to be well-qualified to oversee the project, and there is a strong possibility that it will be executed flawlessly.
The team has also detailed on how they want to accomplish this, and their targets appear to be achievable. The budget is clearly allocated and reasonable in order to implement the concrete measures outlined in a detailed roadmap. The team has also identified a potential challenge or risk in successfully completing this project and has developed a solution to address this issue. I am optimistic about the Accelerate2030 team, and their goals appear to be highly attainable. I am confident that this project will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The information presented and the KPIs mentioned in the proposal are sufficient to fully audit the project's progress and success from its inception to its integration. The specified milestones are also suitable for assessing progress. As a result, the chances of achieving this goal in blockchain technologies and the entire Cardano ecosystem are high. Nevertheless, the acceptance rate of the blockchain and Cardano will be a little challenging since most entrepreneurs in Africa have little or no knowledge about blockchain technology, and this will be an opportunity to increase awareness by educating entrepreneurs, promoting sustainable economic growth, and creating productive and decent employment opportunities for upcoming entrepreneurs and for all.

f6_assessments.q0: The project aims to increase Cardano awareness in Africa by utilizing the global Impact Hub Network and its core program, Accelerate2030 (a global program supporting entrepreneurs from developing & emerging markets to scale their solutions for the Sustainable Development Goals). I believe that the project will have a significant impact on African communities by sharing information on blockchain technology and how to develop solutions on the Cardano blockchain based on the needs of entrepreneurs, fostering greater understanding and enthusiasm for blockchain in emerging innovation ecosystems.
f6_assessments.q1:
The strategy outlines a thorough action plan for the next five months. Proposers have performed a comprehensive study on the current level of blockchain technology use, their needs in adopting blockchain, and which locations will be the most fit to host the events. Furthermore, the money usage is clearly outlined in terms of how it will be spent. 

Although each core team member's personal background is presented nicely, I would want to learn more about them through links/references such as their LinkedIn page.

f6_assessments.q0: There are the beginnings of a lot of interesting and exciting ideas in this proposal. Overall this proposal has met and aligns with the given challenges. Starting with the help of Impact Hub to make this program a success by having more than 16,000 members, the accelerate2030 program becomes more relevant and very likely to happen. Then, look at the big plans to expand Cardano's reach and its sophisticated, especially on the blockchain system, starting with conducting a survey on African which I think is very important to do to find out the interest and satisfaction level of each participant, both entrepreneurs and companies that will adopt blockchain. this system. In addition to the virtual workshops that have been conducted very often, the method proposed by Accelerate2030 regarding the formation of a group of 3 people to conduct in-depth case studies is very relevant to broaden their knowledge and implement it immediatly on that cases. Perhaps the idea is to empower a variety of teams to come up with those specifics, but if so, that should be clarified, with additional detail provided regarding how the teams will be directed or motivated to accomplish the objective. What's more, this proposal is also aware of the challenges and risks that will be faced starting from the untapped potential of the blockchain system and the difficulty of conducting surveys if the survey takers do not benefit from it (so only the surveyors get insight from this survey). However, what I like most about this proposal is the simple presentation of key metrics to assess and track how successful the program is in its early stages.
f6_assessments.q1: The group has appeared to have sufficient aptitudes and involvement within the field to bring this venture live. The sum of investigate and work as of now done by the group appears their passion and will to form this proposition a victory and they give a nitty gritty person portrayal of who they are, which is summed up by their contacts on social systems, making genuine the plausibility of making coordinate contact and getting to know them superior The group too has put up a nitty gritty arrange of how they arrange to induce this done and the breakthroughs see doable. In addition, the project roadmap provided is quite good, although the timeline has not been explained in more detail in weekly or daily units about what they do, but in the monthly concept it is sufficient to explain what they do. The interesting thing that I got is that there are outputs and main deliverables to remind them and conclude about what they will get from each activity they do. What is quite unfortunate is the budget breakdown which is very shallow and not detailed at all considering the background of each member who is already well-known for each field. They should have broken down more from "Design, Launch & Analysis of Survey: $5000 " to Design --> $1000, Launching --> $2000, etc or even more broken down about who did it, how many hours a day, how much is the salary, how many people are working on it, how many survey designs are there? and so forth. It's a huge project, so it needs a lot of publicity to reach the public. Regarding the steps that would make up the entire project, the authors specify very well what would happen in a given period of time. It is always beneficial to draw a timeline of activities to be completed, in parallel with the success achieved over the months, as they do in great detail. And in relation to the budget, it's also explained in a lot of detail, so we have a solid understanding of how the money asked would be used, which parts would cost how much and so on.
f6_assessments.q2: There is clarity in the description of the problem, the solution and how the proposal is aligned with them. The roadmap is very well designed, there are deliverables/milestones that make auditing the proposal easier. The metrics and KPIs were well chosen and I believe they are good indicators for evaluating success, as the chosen outputs would clearly indicate the number of users and participating Asian Companies in this program and the progression over time. Success criteria is relevant and feasable, making it not only auditable but also realistic. Lastly, they need to bear and show the risk that they maybe face on later and how to solve it in a detailed way.

The proposal addresses a number of problems as its seeks to organize some workshops and sensitization to develop concrete use cases to increase adoption of cardano in Africa and accelerate 2030 global program aiming at supporting entrepreneurs from developing markets which was lunched in 2016 by impact Hub and UNDP from Geneva, implemented in 33 countries supporting nearly 500 entrepreneurs.
